|brand = Ultra |model = 4-Port USB 2.0 Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = ULT31807 |page_start_date = 05/18/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ultra 4-Port USB 2.0 Hub (ULT31807) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->

|vendor_id = 05e3 |device_id = 0606 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number -->
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Genesys Logic;GL850A; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|ports = 4 |1394ports = |tt = single |power_led = none |port_led = |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |addlchips =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 08/2005 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 022769318073 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000A0O18C |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There is no silkscreened text on the board, but there is text ("JPCR-06086A 06092A") and a lead-free logo etched onto the bottom of the board. :The '''[[Genesys Logic]]''' hub IC package is marked with "GL850A", "MN1CB03G03", and "617B48884".
The power adapter included with the device would appear to be a '''DVE''' DSA-15P-05 US 050100 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC 2A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
